quiz_items.title: Launch Personalization Q4
quiz_items.question: How can you configure traffic distribution in Launch A/B tests?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["50/50 split only", "Custom percentage distribution", "Random distribution", "Equal distribution among all variants"]
quiz_items.explanation: Launch allows you to set custom traffic distribution percentages for each variant in an A/B test (e.g., 70/30, 60/40, etc.).

quiz_items.title: Launch Advanced Q1
quiz_items.question: What is the purpose of experience priority in Launch?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["Determines load order", "Resolves conflicts when multiple experiences match", "Sets cache duration", "Controls publish status"]
quiz_items.explanation: Experience priority determines which experience is shown when a user matches multiple experience criteria.

quiz_items.title: Data Analytics Q1
quiz_items.question: Which metrics can be tracked using Data & Insights custom events?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["Only page views", "Button clicks, form submissions, video plays, and custom actions", "Only server logs", "Only errors"]
quiz_items.explanation: Data & Insights supports tracking various custom events including user interactions, conversions, and business-specific metrics.

quiz_items.title: Visual Builder Advanced Q1
quiz_items.question: What responsive design capabilities does Visual Builder offer?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["Desktop only", "Mobile only", "Multiple breakpoints (desktop, tablet, mobile)", "Print view only"]
quiz_items.explanation: Visual Builder supports multiple responsive breakpoints allowing you to design and test layouts across different device sizes.

quiz_items.title: AutoDraft Q2
quiz_items.question: Which of the following is a best practice for AutoDraft prompts?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["Be vague to allow creativity", "Provide specific context and desired tone", "Use only single-word prompts", "Never review generated content"]
quiz_items.explanation: Effective AutoDraft prompts should be specific, include context, desired tone, and key information to generate high-quality content.

quiz_items.title: DAM Q3
quiz_items.question: What is the benefit of asset transformations in DAM?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["Only reduces file size", "Automatically creates optimized versions for different devices", "Only changes file format", "Only adds watermarks"]
quiz_items.explanation: DAM asset transformations automatically generate optimized versions (resize, crop, format conversion) for different devices and use cases.

quiz_items.title: Testing Strategy Q1
quiz_items.question: What is regression testing?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["Testing new features only", "Re-testing existing functionality after changes", "Performance testing", "Security testing"]
quiz_items.explanation: Regression testing ensures that existing functionality still works correctly after code changes or new feature additions.

quiz_items.title: Testing Strategy Q2
quiz_items.question: What does the testing pyramid suggest?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["More UI tests than unit tests", "Equal distribution of all test types", "More unit tests at the base, fewer UI tests at the top", "Only manual testing"]
quiz_items.explanation: The testing pyramid recommends having many fast unit tests at the base, fewer integration tests in the middle, and even fewer slow UI tests at the top.

quiz_items.title: Automation Q1
quiz_items.question: What is Page Object Model (POM)?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["A testing framework", "A design pattern for organizing test code", "A type of selector", "A bug tracking method"]
quiz_items.explanation: Page Object Model is a design pattern that creates an object repository for web elements, making tests more maintainable and reducing code duplication.

quiz_items.title: Automation Q2
quiz_items.question: Why should you avoid hard-coded waits in automation?
quiz_items.answer_options: ["They make tests run faster", "They make tests flaky and slow", "They improve accuracy", "They are required by frameworks"]
quiz_items.explanation: Hard-coded waits make tests slower and can still be flaky. Use explicit waits that wait for specific conditions instead.

training_modules.title: Advanced Launch Personalization
training_modules.content:

Advanced Topics:

  • Performance optimization

training_modules.content:

training_modules.content:

training_modules.content:

training_modules.title: CI/CD for QA Engineers
training_modules.content:
CI/CD for QA Engineers

import_instructions.note: This file contains 10 additional quiz items and 10 additional training modules to supplement the 70 entries already created via MCP.
import_instructions.how_to_import: Use Contentstack's Import/Export functionality or Management API to import these entries. Ensure all entries have the 'title' field populated.
